about_the_game:
Armourlily, a blonde bombshell, is an ex-pro swimmer whose career was cut short by a car accident risking spine damage. Forced into a wheelchair for 3 years, her relentless spirit inspired many. Known for her witty TV personality, her optimism is infectious. Her nickname stems from a titanium cervical vertebra implant post-accident. Standing 6ft tall, she often towers over men, yet her humor and courage make her a beacon of hope, especially for sick children. Her journey is a testament to her resilience.

This DLC contains:
- three new levels to beat
- three new photos to hack.

content_descriptors.notes: Occasional nudity, Veiled nudity, General Mature Content
